greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of vertices in the n-th row of the Sierpinski gasket (cf. A047999).
comment: The subsequence of odd terms is A083318. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 13 2014
Equivalently, this is the coordination sequence for the Sierpinski gasket with respect to the apex. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 19 2020
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sierpinski Graph
formula: a(0)=1, a(n) = (2^t(n) + 1) * 2^(c(n) - 1) where t(n) = A007814(n) is the number of trailing zeros in the binary representation of n and c(n) = A000120(n) is the total number of ones in the binary representation of n. - _Johan Falk_, Jun 24 2020
example: After five stages the number of "black" triangles in the structure is A006046(5) = 11 and the number of "black" triangles in row 5 is A001316(5-1) = 2. The number of vertices in row 5 is equal to 4, so a(5) = 4.
Written as an irregular triangle the sequence begins:
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 16 2013
